Rulings.Tengu:
●If you meet the condition enough times, you can activate Recycle as many times as you want in the same Standby Phase.
●You cannot activate Recycle if you have no non-Monster Cards in your GY.
Rulings.Goat:
●If you meet the condition enough times, you can activate Recycle as many times as you want in the same SP.
●You cannot activate Recycle if you have no non-Monster Cards in your GY.
